EmailTemplate.name: Term: Internal Terminated Notification
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Account.Name} | Termination Notification
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
https://login.salesforce.com/{!Account.Id}
{!Account.Name} has been marked as Terminated in SFDC effective immediately. Please review the termination letter, manage shipment of all open orders and collect any receivables.
Partner Relationship Management Team, Please suspend Dealer's Lease Proposal Tool Access in SFDC to prevent dealer from creating new proposals.
Credit Team, Kindly change payment terms to "pre-payment" (which automatically places new orders on hold. They will not book unless a payment is received).
Marketing Operations Team, Please do the following: 1. Check the "Dealer Locator Opt-Out" box from the dealer locator website 2. Change status in SFDC to "Opt-Out" in lead flow for the Automated Lead Routing (ALR) 3. De-activate account in MRC (Marketing Resource Center is a 3rd party on line store with Marketing collateral) 4. Inactivate account in ACB (Advertising Check Bureau which is a 3rd party who manages dealer marketing funds)
Customer Service- Financing SME Team, Please do the following: 1. Uncheck the Enerbank, DCU and Admiral Partner boxes in SFDC 2. Inform the bank that dealer is no longer in SunPower's network of Residential dealers 3. Send termination request
Thank You, Channel Development Team North America, Residential Business Unit
77 Rio Robles San Jose, CA 95134 Phone: 408.240.5580 Fax: 408.240.5400 www.sunpowercorp.com;
